mapper.select: SELECT u.sys_user_code, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.state, r.role_name, COALESCE(art.count, 0) as article_count FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role_id, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT author_id, count(id) as count FROM xy_article GROUP BY author_id) art ON art.author_id = u.id
SELECT u.sys_user_code, u.nickname, u.avatar, r.role_name from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role_id, cast(r.id as char)) where u.id = #{id}

SELECT CONCAT(m.mod_key, ':', a.act_key) as permissions FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role_id, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON JSON_CONTAINS(r.permissions, CAST(p.id AS CHAR)) LEFT JOIN sys_module m ON p.module_id = m.id LEFT JOIN sys_action a ON p.action_id = a.id WHERE u.id = #{id};
SELECT r.role_key FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role_id, CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) WHERE u.id = #{id};
